course.subject: MECH
course.name: Fundamentals of Aeronautical Engineering - Fluid Mechanics
course.description: This course teaches fundamental knowledge in Fluid Mechanics. Topics include basic concepts of hydrostatics; integral and differential equations of fluid flows; conservation of mass, momentum and energy. This course is intended for students without relevant background but who want to enroll to the Minor Program of Aeronautical Engineering. Instructor's approval is required for enrollment in the course.
course.exclusions: CIVL 2510, MECH 2210
